void DzStyledPropertyWgt::addWidgetRow ( QWidget *  wgt,
int  stretch = 0,
Qt::Alignment  align = 0 
) [protected]

Adds the given widget as a new row in this property wgt.

Note:
: the body widget has a fixed height, subclasses wishing to use this method should also increase the fixed height the body widget when the widget is constructed and styled.
Warning:
: Because the standard property views in the interface rely on the fixed height of property widgets, subclasses that us this method should not be set as the the return of a DzProperty::getWidgetClass().

QString DzStyledPropertyWgt::getValueEditText (  )  const [protected, virtual]

Returns the text to display during edit of value label. Override in subclasses to control test displayed for edit.

void DzStyledPropertyWgt::valueTextChanged ( const QString &  text  )  [protected, virtual]

Changes the value text to the specified text. Override in subclasses to get text edit changes. Default just calls setPropertyValueLabel() on whatever was entered by the user.
